name: Cyber Slide
description:
This is a simple puzzle game where you must maneuver boxes in order to create a clear shot to the target opposite you. Hitting the arrow keys will cause all the movable boxes to move in that direction. Space bar will fire a shot, but you have limited ammo. Blue boxes can be destroyed

Press escape to reset the level.

This game is based on a puzzle type that appears towards the end of Undertale. So if you liked those slide and shoot puzzles this has 17 more for you to try out.

10/5: HTML5 version was bugged, so I uploaded the Windows downloadable version.
